SEARCH
Package observer

Interface ViewObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController
public interface ViewObserver
Observer interface used only for the view.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onChatLogMessage()
    Method used to show the chat log
    void
    onChatMessage(String sender, String receiver, String text)
    This method will be used to send the message in the chat to the other players
    void
    onMaxPlayers(int numOfPlayers)
    This method will send the maximum number of players for the game.
    void
    onRequestCommonObjectives()
    This method will be used by the View to show the common objectives on screen.
    void
    onRequestOthersLibrary()
    This method will be used by the View to show the other players' library on screen.
    void
    onRequestPersonalObjective()
    This method will be used by the View to show the personal objective on screen.
    void
    onUpdateBoardMove(ArrayList<Integer> coordinatesToSend)
    This method will send the coordinates of the object cards the player wants to pick.
    void
    onUpdateLibraryMove(ArrayList<Integer> orderAndColumnToSend)
    This method will send the order in which the picked cards will be put in the library.
    void
    onUpdateNickname(String nickname)
    This method will send the username on the network.
    void
    onUpdateServerInfo(Map<String,String> serverInfo)
    This method will send the necessary info to open a socket with the server.

  • Method Details

    • onUpdateServerInfo

      void onUpdateServerInfo(Map<String,String> serverInfo)
      This method will send the necessary info to open a socket with the server.
      Parameters:
      serverInfo - is a Map that has the address as key and the IP address as value.

    • onUpdateNickname

      void onUpdateNickname(String nickname)
      This method will send the username on the network.
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname passed by the View.

    • onMaxPlayers

      void onMaxPlayers(int numOfPlayers)
      This method will send the maximum number of players for the game.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - is the number of players for the game.

    • onUpdateBoardMove

      void onUpdateBoardMove(ArrayList<Integer> coordinatesToSend)
      This method will send the coordinates of the object cards the player wants to pick.
      Parameters:
      coordinatesToSend - are the coordinates, stored as an ArrayList.

    • onUpdateLibraryMove

      void onUpdateLibraryMove(ArrayList<Integer> orderAndColumnToSend)
      This method will send the order in which the picked cards will be put in the library. It will send the column where the cards will be put as well.
      Parameters:
      orderAndColumnToSend - are the order and the column, stored as an ArrayList.

    • onRequestCommonObjectives

      void onRequestCommonObjectives()
      This method will be used by the View to show the common objectives on screen. This method is particularly useful in the CLI.

    • onRequestPersonalObjective

      void onRequestPersonalObjective()
      This method will be used by the View to show the personal objective on screen. This method is particularly useful in the CLI.

    • onRequestOthersLibrary

      void onRequestOthersLibrary()
      This method will be used by the View to show the other players' library on screen. This method is particularly useful in the CLI.

    • onChatMessage

      void onChatMessage(String sender, String receiver, String text)
      This method will be used to send the message in the chat to the other players
      Parameters:
      sender - is the player who is sending the message
      receiver - is the player/players who is receiving the message
      text - is the message text

    • onChatLogMessage

      void onChatLogMessage()
      Method used to show the chat log
